## Description

:memo: Describe what your code does.

> [!IMPORTANT]
> The next section could be only checked or unchecked.

## Developer checks

_(If some checks are not applicable, use ~ to comment them out.)_
_(Example: - [ ] ~✅ **Check the tests (if applicable)**~ .)_

- [ ] ✅ **Check that the project build works**
- [ ] ✅ **Check the tests (if applicable)**
- [ ] ✅ **Ensure there are no logs or unnecessary comments in the code**
- [ ] ✅ **Code follows project conventions**
- [ ] ✅ **Updated documentation (if needed)**
- [ ] ✅ **No breaking changes (or documented if present)**
